title: Seasonal Rewards
body: I reached Gold 2 during the season, and am yet to receive anything for reaching gold, this includes the champion maokai, the skin for maokai, the gold icon, the gold border. i read on the LoL site i would receive it latest by 29th of November, where is it??

replies.body:
Did you receive a punishment this season?

You won't be eligible for end of season rewards if:

+ You had an active bans or chat restriction when the season ended.
+ If you received a ban for more than 7 days after August 7.
+ If you elo boosted/got boosted this season.

I can't remember, but probably :(
that's so stupid
one whole year gone pretty much cause of probably an afk bann cause of Australian internet

By AFK ban do you mean Low Priority Queue?

If Low Priority Queue was your only offense then you should still be fine for end of season rewards. Low Priority Queue isn't considered a ban. You should send a ticket to [Riot Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) asking why they haven't sent your rewards yet.

If you're unsure where to file your ticket, just select:
[I have a question about League of Legends/Riot Games.] > [Game and Features] > [General Questions]
